mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FOODORDER(ORDERNUMBER, ORDERTIME, MEMBERID, MEMBERNAME, MEMBERTEL, MEMBERADDRESS, PRICE, ORDERINFO, MENUNAME, AMOUNT, STATE, STORENAME, STOREADDRESS, STORETEL, HIT) VALUES(#{ordernumber},#{ordertime},#{memberid},#{membername},#{membertel}, #{memberaddress},#{price},#{orderinfo},#{menuname},#{amount}, '승인대기',#{storename},#{storeaddress},#{storetel},0)
